#labels Phase-Implementation
= Cubi Core Modules =

Cubi implements most commonly used application logic in its core modules. They are
 * System module
 * Menu module
 * User module
 * MyAccount module
 * Service module
 * Email module
 * Cache module
 * Event log module
 * Security module
 * Theme module
 * Cronjob module
 * Help module
 * Other modules

The chart below describes the layers of Cubi platform.
